titles.title: Zuni Indian Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act of 2024
Zuni Indian Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act of 2024
Zuni Indian Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act of 2024
A bill to approve the settlement of water rights claims of the Zuni Indian Tribe in the Zuni River Stream System in the State of New Mexico, to protect the Zuni Salt Lake, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 118-551.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Schatz without amendment. With written report No. 118-262.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 664.

committee.name: Senate Indian Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Hearings By (Full Committee), Referred To
